item.item: By UCenter Home can easily build a relationship with friends as the core communication network, so that site users can record mini-blog sentence of life in bit by bit; quickly and easily publish blogs, upload pictures; more can be very convenient to share information with their friends who discuss topics of interest; easily and quickly understand the latest developments
Thread types would be added to the UCenter Home feed:

If someone launched, reply or participate in selected thread types, this action will be posted to the UCenter Home, displayed to the UCenter Home feeds. If you do not select "Replies", then only initiated the subject action posted to the UCenter Home.
Which following UCenter Home pages show information:

Head of regional and personal information page displays name of a Member's personal feeds in the UCenter Home.
Posts advertising is below the bottom of each post to show the entire station UCenter Home feeds, if and only if the post below will be displayed when advertising free UCenter Home feeds

You have not installed UCenter Home program, can not set

Want to learn or install UCenter Home, click here to enter our warehouses

Setup to allow issued UCenter Home feed pages, you can hold down CTRL multi choice
